verses.text: \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* came \w together|strong="G4863"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*, which \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G3101"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w* \w with|strong="G5495"\w* \w defiled|strong="G2839"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* is to \w say|strong="G2076"\w*, with \w unwashen|strong="G0449"\w*, \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, they found \w fault|strong="G3201"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w except|strong="G1437"\w* they \w wash|strong="G3538"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w oft|strong="G4435"\w*, \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w holding|strong="G2902"\w* the \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w* of the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add when they come\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w market|strong="G0058"\w*, \w except|strong="G1437"\w* they \w wash|strong="G0907"\w*, they \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* other \w things|strong="G0243"\w* there \w be|strong="G2076"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they have \w received|strong="G3880"\w* to \w hold|strong="G2902"\w*, \add as\add* the \w washing|strong="G0909"\w* of \w cups|strong="G4221"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pots|strong="G3582"\w*, brasen \w vessels|strong="G5473"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w tables|strong="G2825"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1899"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w* of the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w* \w with|strong="G5495"\w* \w unwashen|strong="G0449"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*?

He \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Well|strong="G2573"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G4395"\+w* \+w Esaias|strong="G2268"\+w* \+w prophesied|strong="G4395"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w hypocrites|strong="G5273"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w people|strong="G2992"\+w* \+w honoureth|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w with|strong="G5491"\+w* \+add their\+add* \+w lips|strong="G5491"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w their|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w heart|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w is|strong="G0568"\+w* \+w far|strong="G4206"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w in vain|strong="G3155"\+w* \+w do they worship|strong="G4576"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w teaching|strong="G1321"\+w* \+add for\+add* \+w doctrines|strong="G1319"\+w* \+w the commandments|strong="G1778"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w laying aside|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w the commandment|strong="G1785"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w ye hold|strong="G2902"\+w* \+w the tradition|strong="G3862"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+add as\+add* \+w the washing|strong="G0909"\+w* \+w of pots|strong="G3582"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w cups|strong="G4221"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w other|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w such|strong="G5108"\+w* \+w like things|strong="G3946"\+w* \+w ye do|strong="G4160"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Full well|strong="G2573"\+w* \+w ye reject|strong="G0114"\+w* \+w the commandment|strong="G1785"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye may keep|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w your own|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w tradition|strong="G3862"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w Honour|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w Whoso curseth|strong="G2551"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w let him die|strong="G5053"\+w* \+w the death|strong="G2288"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w to his father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+add It is\+add* \+w Corban|strong="G2878"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w is to say|strong="G2076"\+w*, \+w a gift|strong="G1435"\+w*, \+w by|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w thou mightest be profited|strong="G5623"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*; \+add he shall be free\+add*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye suffer|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3765"\+w* \+w to do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w ought|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w for|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w Making|strong="G0208"\+w* \+w the word|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of none effect|strong="G0208"\+w* \+w through your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w tradition|strong="G3862"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w ye have delivered|strong="G3860"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w such|strong="G5108"\+w* \+w like things|strong="G3946"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* ye.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \add unto him\add*, he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Hearken|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w unto me|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w every one|strong="G3956"\+w* \+add of you\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w understand|strong="G4920"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w There is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w from without|strong="G1855"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w entering|strong="G1531"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w the things which come out|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w those|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w are they|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w that defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w the man|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*
\wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w ears|strong="G3775"\+w* \+w to hear|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w let him hear|strong="G0191"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he was \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w parable|strong="G3850"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w without understanding|strong="G0801"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*? \+w Do ye|strong="G3539"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w perceive|strong="G3539"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w thing from without|strong="G1855"\+w* \+w entereth|strong="G1531"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+add it\+add* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w*\+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w Because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w it entereth|strong="G1531"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w heart|strong="G2588"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the belly|strong="G2836"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w goeth out|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the draught|strong="G0856"\+w*, \+w purging|strong="G2511"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w meats|strong="G1033"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w That which cometh out|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w defileth|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w the man|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w from within|strong="G2081"\+w*, \+w out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w of the heart|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w proceed|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G2556"\+w* \+w thoughts|strong="G1261"\+w*, \+w adulteries|strong="G3430"\+w*, \+w fornications|strong="G4202"\+w*, \+w murders|strong="G5408"\+w*,\wj*

\wj  \+w Thefts|strong="G2829"\+w*, \+w covetousness|strong="G4124"\+w*, \+w wickedness|strong="G4189"\+w*, \+w deceit|strong="G1388"\+w*, \+w lasciviousness|strong="G0766"\+w*, \+w an|strong="G3788"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G4190"\+w* \+w eye|strong="G3788"\+w*, \+w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\+w*, \+w pride|strong="G5243"\+w*, \+w foolishness|strong="G0877"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w All|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w these|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w evil things|strong="G4190"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w from within|strong="G2081"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w the man|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* from \w thence|strong="G1564"\w* he \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, and \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w borders|strong="G3181"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sidon|strong="G4605"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* an \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, and would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \add it\add*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* he \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w hid|strong="G2990"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G1135"\w* \add certain\add* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* young \w daughter|strong="G2365"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w an|strong="G4151"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w came|strong="G2064"\w* and \w fell|strong="G4363"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*:

The \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w Greek|strong="G1674"\w*, a \w Syrophenician|strong="G4949"\w* by \w nation|strong="G1085"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* she \w besought|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he would cast \w forth|strong="G1544"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1140"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G2364"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Let|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5043"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4412"\+w* \+w be filled|strong="G5526"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w meet|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w to take|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w the children’s|strong="G5043"\+w* \+w bread|strong="G0740"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to cast|strong="G0906"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w unto the dogs|strong="G2952"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* she \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w yet|strong="G1063"\w* the \w dogs|strong="G2952"\w* \w under|strong="G5270"\w* the \w table|strong="G5132"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w children’s|strong="G3813"\w* \w crumbs|strong="G5589"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w For|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5126"\+w* \+w saying|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w go thy way|strong="G5217"\+w*; \+w the devil|strong="G1140"\+w* \+w is gone out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w daughter|strong="G2364"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when she was \w come|strong="G0565"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, she \w found|strong="G2147"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1140"\w* gone \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* her \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w* \w laid|strong="G0906"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w bed|strong="G2825"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w departing|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w coasts|strong="G3725"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sidon|strong="G4605"\w*, he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w through|strong="G0303"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w coasts|strong="G3725"\w* of \w Decapolis|strong="G1179"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w bring|strong="G5342"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* one that was \w deaf|strong="G2974"\w*, and had an impediment in his \w speech|strong="G3424"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w put|strong="G2007"\w* his \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w upon|strong="G2007"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G0618"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w aside|strong="G2398"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, and \w put|strong="G0906"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w fingers|strong="G1147"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ears|strong="G3775"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w spit|strong="G4429"\w*, and \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* looking \w up|strong="G0308"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, he \w sighed|strong="G4727"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Ephphatha|strong="G2188"\+w*,\wj* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, Be \w opened|strong="G1272"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ears|strong="G0189"\w* were \w opened|strong="G1272"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w string|strong="G1199"\w* \w of|strong="G1100"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* was \w loosed|strong="G3089"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w plain|strong="G3723"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w charged|strong="G1291"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w tell|strong="G2036"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w more|strong="G3745"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w charged|strong="G1291"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, so much the \w more|strong="G3123"\w* a great \w deal|strong="G4054"\w* they \w published|strong="G2784"\w* \add it\add*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1605"\w* beyond \w measure|strong="G5249"\w* \w astonished|strong="G1605"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, He hath \w done|strong="G4160"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*: he \w maketh|strong="G4160"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* the \w deaf|strong="G2974"\w* to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dumb|strong="G0216"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*.
